EmailTemplate.name: 16.ComColl.SessionBC.none.D.G.E.2426.Email 3 - SBC Brochure
EmailTemplate.subject: The role of SBCs is growing. Nokia can meet your requirements.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A new Nokia brochure. The Nokia SBC is now cloud-ready with new features and enhanced flexibility. View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Migrating SBCs to the Cloud Brochure: Virtualize and cloudify your Session Border Controller
SBC is the cornerstone of all IP-communications voice, video and messaging services due to its strategic position at the edge of CSPs’ access and peering networks. As a result, this requires SBCs to constantly evolve, grow its feature list and execute new functions.
Discover the Nokia Cloud SBC solution and understand how Nokia can help meet your requirements. In this brochure, get a detailed overview of the Nokia Cloud SBC solution and how our SBC virtual network functions (VNFs) meet both the traditional and new requirements of today’s fixed, mobile, cable and converged networks.
Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Communications and Collaboration Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
